name: ollamastack
description: A modern, production-ready boilerplate for building AI chat applications with Ollama, LangChain, Next.js, and FastAPI

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --cov=app && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.ollama:pull: docker exec ollamastack-ollama-1 ollama pull llama3.2
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../backend && rm -rf __pycache__ .pytest_cache
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: OllamaStack Team
